name: Sinmag Planetary Mixer – Belt Drive Series SM-201
Features: SM-201 Bowl capacity: 20 liters SM-401 Bowl capacity: 40 liters Features Standard with bowl, whipping ball, beater and hook. 3 speeds. Mechanical transmission. The machine has to be stopped to change gears

name: Sinmag Planetary Mixer – Table Model SM-5L
Features: SM-5L: Bowl capacity: 5 liters Features Standard with bowl, whipping ball, beater and hook. Easy to move and operate. Lasting for long time. Used for eggs mixing, ﬂour kneading, mush potato mixing etc.

name: Sinmag Planetary Mixer – Digital Series SM-80L
Features: SM-20L Bowl capacity: 20 liters SM-40L Bowl capacity: 40 liters SM-60L/60LM Bowl capacity: 60 liters SM-80L Bowl capacity: 80 liters Features Digital panel. Drawings, descriptions and photos are not contractual and can be modified. 10 speeds changed by inverter. Standard with bow|, whipping ball, beater and hook. SM-60LM & SM80L:with automatic bowl lifting. Optionally available with reduction bowl. With a safety grid to protect operator. Optional bowls.
